charinfo.name: Animal Path Pein (S)
charinfo.description: Animal Path Pein (S) is one of the six paths of Pein. This Path is able to summon a variety of different beasts for different purposes. Original Design: Kostas

abilities.name: Cerberus Hydra
abilities.description: Animal Path Pein summons a giant multiple headed dog that deals 30 damage to one enemy. The following 2 turns any enemy that uses a skill will be dealt 15 piercing damage.

abilities.name: Drill Bird
abilities.description: Animal Path Pein summons a giant drill-beaked bird to assault one enemy, dealing 15 damage to them for 3 turns.

abilities.name: Invisible Chameleon
abilities.description: Animal Path Pein summons a chameleon that is able to become invisible to hide himself. For 4 turns Animal Path Pein will ignore enemy stun effects and gains 50% damage reduction.

abilities.name: Panda Defense
abilities.description: This skill makes Animal Path Pein invulnerable for 1 turn.
